div.head: Welcome to LoboVault!
div.p: LoboVault is UNM's Institutional Repository. It hosts scholarly publications from UNM faculty, graduate student theses and dissertations, UNM administrative records, and more. Please contact us at reposit@unm.edu for more information or to become a submitter to LoboVault.

Useful scholarly communications links:
Office of eScholarship at UNM
SPARC Author Addendum help negotiating publishing agreements
Sherpa/Romeo determine publisher/journal archiving policies
